verses.text: \w To|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H5375"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*;
in You, my God, I trust. Do not \w let|strong="H5970"\w* me be put to shame; do not \w let|strong="H5970"\w* my enemies \w exult|strong="H5970"\w* over me.
